Html:
Is it possible to get a setup guide. That is what users need to be created and various other aspects to match the usage of the application.

Thanks.

What kind of content are you looking for? A setup guide for running the Fabrikam website installer? The source code downloads are pretty self-explanatory, and the 20497 scripts are meant to be used during the delivery of the MOC 20497 course (the "setup guide" is part of that course).

Let me know specifically what you are looking for.

Thanks.
